title: Monoprice Harmony Puck Portable Bluetooth 5.0 Speaker IPx4, Loud Souund, Waterproof, TWS, 21H Playtime, for Home and Outdoor
features: Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Connectivity: Built in Bluetooth 5.0 wireless connectivity allows for connections up to 32 feet (10 meters) from your smartphone or computer.
IPX4 Water Resistance: Made for all weather outdoor use, the Harmony Puck Bluetooth Speaker has an IPx4 water resistance rating, meaning it can withstand splashing water from any direction.

Long Lasting Battery Life: The built in rechargeable lithium ion battery provides plenty of juice for extended listening. Get up to 21 hours of continuous playback at 50 percent volume and up to 4 hours of continuous playback at 100 percent volume.
Compact and Robust Build Quality: The Harmony Puck Bluetooth Speaker packs amazing technology into an ultraslim form factor that provides great sound and worry free portability.

Connect 2 Units For TrueWireless Stereo Playback: The Qualcomm percent TrueWireless Stereo (TWS) feature allows you to connect two Harmony Puck Bluetooth percent Speakers together to form a stereo pair for true stereo playback.
description: The Monoprice Harmony Puck Bluetooth Speaker is our smallest portable bluetooth speaker, making it perfect for on‑the‑go audio when you're travelling light. Bluetooth 5.0 ensures easy connection to your smartphone or PC with long range connectivity, while the TWS (TrueWireless Stereo) function allows you to add an additional Harmony Puck to create a true stereo playback speaker system. IPx4 water resistance ensures robust all weather build quality for on‑the‑go applications, while a rechargeable battery provides hours of portable music convenience.
